phrs.translation: 闲荡, 闲逛, 他们一路闲逛

sentences.translation: 每年都有35万名游客走过这里。

sentences.sentence: A better tip still is to get off your bottom and strut (or even traipse) around the office.
sentences.translation: 还有个更好的建议，就是站起来，饶着办公室大踏步，甚至可以到处闲逛。

sentences.sentence: (traipse) They traipsed all the way to the downtown area to watch the National Day fireworks display.
sentences.translation: 他们一路闲逛，漫步来到市中心区域观看庆祝国庆的烟花燃放。
